### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE remote_work_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    policy_description TEXT,
    effective_date DATE,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE remote_work_policies SET policy_description = 'New policy description' WHERE policy_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE remote_work_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_description TEXT,
    policy_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_roles (
    role_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    role_name VARCHAR(255),
    role_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policy_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    update_description TEXT,
    update_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES remote_work_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    request_date DATE,
    request_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    employee_email VARCHAR(255),
    role_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES employee_roles(role_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE remote_work_policies
SET policy_description = 'New description for policy 1'
WHERE policy_id = 1;

    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES employee_roles(role_id)
);

UPDATE employee_roles
SET role_description = 'Updated description for role 2'
WHERE role_id = 2;

    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

    policy_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_roles (

    role_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policy_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    update_description TEXT,
    update_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES remote_work_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    request_date DATE,
    request_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    employee_email VARCHAR(255),
    role_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES employee_roles(role_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE policy_updates
SET update_description = 'Policy update on remote work guidelines'
WHERE update_id = 1;
